article: Jack is an English boy. He is a good student. He is twelve-year-old. Now he is in a red c oat. Linda is Jack's sister. She is a good girl. She is fourteen. Now she is in a green dress. Lucy and Lily are from the USA. They are students, too. They are in red coats. They look the same. Jack, Linda, Lucy and Lily are good friends. Jack, Lucy and Lily are in No. 1 Middle School. But Linda is in No. 11 Middle School. They all like China.
questions: Jack, Linda, Lucy and Lily are _ .
